item.title: Device locks out Fox Newsâ€¦
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: It's not that Sam Kimery objects to the views expressed on Fox News. The creator of the "Fox Blocker" contends the channel is not news at all. Kimery figures he's sold about 100 of the little silver bits of metal that screw into the back of most televisions, allowing people to filter Fox News from their sets, since its August debut. (Link courtesy of DailyKos)
